ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR((NOT(ISBLANK(Text(cgcloud__Language_1__c))) && OR(Text(cgcloud__Language_1__c)== Text(cgcloud__Language_2__c), Text(cgcloud__Language_1__c)== Text(cgcloud__Language_3__c), Text(cgcloud__Language_1__c)== Text(cgcloud__Language_4__c))),(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Language_2__c))) && OR(Text(cgcloud__Language_2__c)== Text(cgcloud__Language_3__c), Text(cgcloud__Language_2__c)== Text(cgcloud__Language_4__c))),(NOT(ISBLANK(Text(cgcloud__Language_3__c))) && (Text(cgcloud__Language_3__c)== Text(cgcloud__Language_4__c) ))),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Language already exists, please enter different Language.
